buffer API¶

Buffer *new_buffer(int capacity)¶
Parameters

  • capacity – The capacity of the newly created buffer

Returns

The newly created buffer, NULL if something goes wrong

void delete_buffer(Buffer *This)¶
Parameters

  • This – Buffer to be deleted

int buffer_push(Buffer *This, int c)¶
Parameters

  • This – Concerned buffer

  • c – character to be push at the end of the buffer

Returns

0 if everythings OK, 1 if buffer capacity is excedeed
